name.description: Service name for the schema-registry instance(s)

listener_protocol.title: Registry listener protocol
listener_protocol.description: Registry listener protocol, http or https.

ssl_client_auth.description: Used for HTTPS. Whether or not to require the HTTPS client to authenticate via the server's trust store.

virtual_network_name.description: The name of the virtual network to join

virtual_network_plugin_labels.description: Labels to pass to the virtual network plugin (e.g., [{"key": "key_1", "value": "value_1"}, {"key": "key_2", "value": "value_2"}])

user.description: The user that the service will run as.
user.title: User

instances.description: Number of instances to run (currently limited to 1).

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to each schema-registry instance.

mem.description: Memory (MB) to allocate to each schema-registry instance.

heap.description: JVM heap allocation (in MB) for connect worker task; should be no greater than ~64MB less than total memory for the instance.

role.description: Deploy schema-registry only on nodes with this role.

access-control-allow-methods.description: Set value to Jetty Access-Control-Allow-Origin header for specified methods

access-control-allow-origin.description: Set value for Jetty Access-Control-Allow-Origin header

ciphers.description: Comma-separated list of JSSE Cipher Suite Names

zookeeper_connect.title: Zookeeper connect
zookeeper_connect.description: ... . Note slahes in a kafka service name have to be removed, all excpet the first get replaced by two underscores.

client_security_protocol.title: Kafka client security protocol
client_security_protocol.description: Protocol used to communicate with brokers. Valid values are: PLAINTEXT, SSL, SASL_PLAINTEXT, SASL_SSL

kafkastore-bootstrap-servers.title: Kafka bootstrap servers
kafkastore-bootstrap-servers.description: A list of Kafka brokers to connect to. For example, PLAINTEXT://kafka-0-broker.confluent-kafka.autoip.dcos.thisdcos.directory:9092,SSL://kafka-0-broker.confluent-kafka.autoip.dcos.thisdcos.directory:9092

client_sasl_mechanism.title: Kafka client sasl mechanism
client_sasl_mechanism.description: SASL mechanism used for client connections. This may be any mechanism for which a security provider is available. GSSAPI is the default mechanism.

client_sasl_kerberos_service_name.title: Kafka client sasl kerberos service name
client_sasl_kerberos_service_name.description: The Kerberos principal name that Kafka runs as. This can be defined either in Kafka's JAAS config or in Kafka's config.

kerberos_jaas_secret.title: Kerberos jaas secret
kerberos_jaas_secret.description: Kerberos jaas secret containing jaas config

kerberos_krb5_secret.title: Kerberos krb5 secret
kerberos_krb5_secret.description: Kerberos krb5 secret containing krb5 config
